name: Floppy Box
description: This is the company's first game - it's small, but fun. Send it to your friends - Floppy Box is a perfect time waster! While waiting in queue for that next game of Fortnite, CS:GO or League of Legends, challenge your friends and see who can get the highest score. Can you land the box inside the safe zone more than anyone else? Find out here. This is the first version of the game, so if there are any bugs please comment them on this post.
